snippet: SAPIR--Louis. The members of the New York Society for Ethical Culture and the Ethical Culture Fieldston School community mourn the loss of our devoted former board trustee. Mr. Sapir also served on the board of Mt. Pleasant Cemetery, founded by the New York Society as one of the first non-denominational and inclusive cemeteries in the country. His reasoning and compassion were highly valued by all who knew him. Our heartfelt condolences to his daughters Margaret and Joan, Fieldston alumnae, their families and friends. Anne Klaeysen, Leader, New York Society for Ethical Culture Damian J. Fernandez, Head of School 1/3
